body_text:
Without this, we throw an error on shutdown, preventing the cleanups from happening.
This wasn't caught by the lints because the rule that understands Cu.import doesn't seem to understand scopes. Correction: Cu.import is global, so it doesn't matter if we do it in function-local scopes.
In some cases, we didn't get to the Cu.import line in startup, so we never imported LogManager to begin with.
CC @kmaglione

title: recipe-client-addon: Fix missing import of LogManager in bootstrap::shutdown
body:
Without this, we throw an error on shutdown, preventing the cleanups from happening.

~~This wasn't caught by the lints because the rule that understands `Cu.import` doesn't seem to understand scopes.~~ Correction: `Cu.import` is global, so it doesn't matter if we do it in function-local scopes.

In some cases, we didn't get to the `Cu.import` line in `startup`, so we never imported `LogManager` to begin with.

CC @kmaglione
